data.name: Common
data.desc: Allows item to be upgraded to level 4.

data.name: Uncommon
data.desc: Allows item to be upgraded to level 5.

data.name: Rare
data.desc: Allows item to be upgraded to level 6.

data.name: Epic
data.desc: Allows item to be upgraded to level 7.

data.name: Legendary
data.desc: Allows item to be upgraded to level 8.

data.name: Mythical
data.desc: Allows item to be automatically unlocked at the beginning of the game.
